body.name: Veeda 100% Natural Cotton Compact BPA-Free Applicator Tampons Chlorine, Toxin and Pesticide Free, Super, 16 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 6 hrs
features: 100% NATURAL COTTON - Our Tampons are made from GMO-free cotton and are 100% biodegradable, hypoallergenic and gynaecologically tested.
FUNCTIONAL AND COMFORTABLE - Customers report LESS DISCOMFORT and SHORTER PERIODS.
REDUCES RISK OF TOXIC SHOCK SYNDROME - Oxygen cleansing creates a chlorine and pesticide FREE product, ensuring only 100% natural cotton touches your body.
DESIGNED FOR COMFORT - Designed and manufactured with comfort in mind, our applicator tampons feature a BPA-Free plastic applicator and are healthy, safe, effective and irritation free.
FREE FROM HARMFUL CHEMICALS - Veeda tampons are Pesticide, dioxin, chemical, chlorine, dye, fragrance and synthetic FREE.
body.description: Veeda Tampons provide the comfort and reliability you want. Made with 100% Natural cotton and no harmful ingredients. Made with specialized grooves for all-around coverage to help prevent leaks.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ABOUT VEEDA We created Veeda because you and your body deserve the best. No harsh chemicals here — just natural goodness that always goes with the flow (literally).

Why You'll Love Veeda Better for You No chemicals. No synthetics. No fragrances. Our tampons re made with a non-GMO natural cotton designed for comfort and protection. Better for the Planet Our tampons packaged using recyclable materials. Veeda is committed to sustainably sourced ingredients and safe manufacturing processes. Better for All We’re working to end period poverty once and for all. Every time you buy a Veeda product, you help us deliver period care essentials to those who need them the most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these! My new go to tampons. I’ve been wanting to switch from my usual organic brand, they were getting a little pricey. I came across this brand at a reasonable price, so I decided to try them. They worked great! My only complaint would be how noisy the wrapper is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You won't regret switching to these
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Good Absorbency. Only peeve about it is when opening the packaging its so LOUD. Sounds like I am unwrapping candy in the stall and announces exactly what I am doing. Maybe people don't hear it and I am over concious about it since our office restroom is a cavernous echo chamber but if I had a suggestion for the company is to make the wrapping out of something else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only tampons that do not contain "PEG"
reviews.reviewText: I am very excited to find polyethylene glycol free tampons. If you have an allergies to other brands, this is the only tampon that is free and clear of all parabans

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kotex Security dupe
reviews.reviewText: After Kotex discontinued their Security line, nothing worked until I learned about this brand in a facebook group trying to get Kotex to being Security back. Excellent dupe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Most
reviews.reviewText: I used to find this brand at a local store, but they stopped carrying them. Forgot about this brand. When quarantine hit, I decided to seek out the few creature comforts I'm unwilling to compromise with on the 'Zon. Found this 3 pack of 16s. Decent value. These 'pons are decent effectiveness. If I can't find this brand I aim for OB. These are not a bad sub for those. It is what it is. When the machines rise up I might switch to a cup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is not a pack of 3
reviews.reviewText: I received my package today and I ordered a pack of three bundle, and it only came one individual pack. Of course, there is an option to return it . Completely got ripped off .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not sure anymore....
reviews.reviewText: I don't have issues with the applicator, since I've used these before and am used to how it works. Also, I know how it's going to be when you take it out when it's kind of dry, again used to it. But my issue is something else. I used to like these a lot, but this time it seems to absorb on the string and complete saturate it before even absord on basically any of the tampon, causing worries about and string leakage even outside of the extra long and wide liners. It's unfortunate because I bought 3 boxes of L,R, AND S, at the same time. I hope they're not all like that, because that's $30 down the drain and like 90 tampons I can't use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2016
reviews.reviewText: The only thing that could make this better is a multi-pack with varied absorbancy levels. For the first two days, I needed the super plus or I had to change my tampon every 5 hours before slight leakage. Which is fine, as it isn't advisable to wear a tampon longer than 6-8 hours. The last three days were perfect. No leaks, no mess. These are comfortable, non irritating and easy to insert. Removal is a breeze and doesn't hurt at all, even when semi dry. I love them and won't go back to sea sponges, traditional tampons, pads or period underwear. Awesome!!
I have been using this brand for years now. I am a big fan. No harsh chemicals, no scent, and very comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: No Nasties and Great For Your Health
reviews.reviewText: I have been using organic tampons for many years after ditching the famous brand T. I no longer have any biting or fuzzy pains which I was experiencing from using T brand. Never will I go back again thank you.

Perché fare degli assorbenti in cotone biologico naturale biodegradabile eccetera eccetera e poi fornirli di un applicatore in plastica che resterà per anni nell’ambiente??? Inoltre sono piuttosto scomodi come assorbenti interni.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 23, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE VEEDA!I am so happy I came across these a few years ago. They're so comfortable and protecting.Really glad they're back. Definitely recommend, if you're looking for a more natural product.

I was so happy when I found Veeda. Natural Care tampons were super uncomfortable. I don't feel these at all and they're perfect. Unsure if the cotton helps with cramping, but I notice less cramping. Unsure if that's just a coincidence.
